title: Rogero CEX CFW 4.55 v.1.00 + Multiman 04.55.0 FULL PS3
description:
Rogero CFW4.55 v1.00


 ReactPSN patch.
 Cinavia Disabled for HDD content playback only.
 noBD/noBT patches to allow installation on consoles with broken BluRay Drive or Bluetooth board.
 This CFW can be installed fine from XMB Update over OFW3.55 or any CFW   version  <=   4.55
 HDD can be swapped/changed and the CFW will re-install without any problem.
 Patched LV1 to disable LV2 Protection.
 Patched LV1 to add peek/poke support.
 Patched LV1 Core OS Hash Check (to prevent Bricking on non-dehashed downgraded consoles)
 Patched LV2 to add peek/poke support.
 QA Flag enabled by default to allow for easier downgrading using Recovery Menu.
 RSOD screen bypass patch for RSOD machines (it won't fix the RSOD but allows the PS3 to boot fine into XMB)
 PSN/SEN access is available but it's not recommended.
 It can run games signed with Keys up to version 4.55 without any Eboot/Sprx patching needed.
 The CFW can be used for Downgrading with Hardware flashers with PS3 Flash Tool v4.55


 Installation:

 Method 1


 Remove the disc from BD drive
 Rename the downloaded firmware file PS3UPDAT_Rogero_CEX_4.55_v1.00.PUP to PS3UPDAT.PUP .
 Copy the firmware file PS3UPDAT.PUP to USB flash drive (FAT32) to a folder PS3/UPDATE .
 Insert the USB flash drive into the PS3.
 Turn on the PS3.
 On the PS3, select system updates, update from media and follow the instructions on the screen.
 Firmware is installed.
 Installing multiMAN completely




 Method 2


 Remove the disc from BD drive
 Rename the downloaded firmware file PS3UPDAT_Rogero_CEX_4.55_v1.00.PUP to PS3UPDAT.PUP .
 Copy the firmware file PS3UPDAT.PUP to USB flash drive (FAT32) to a folder PS3/UPDATE .
 Insert the USB flash drive into the PS3.
 Turn off the PS3.
 Press the power button and hold until you hear two beeps after which the PS3 will turn off, then release the button.
 Push the power button and hold it until you hear the first one short beep, followed by two short beeps, then release the button.
 Make all the instructions on the screen, select system update in the very last paragraph.
 PS3 some time off (do not touch the console at this point), and as a result will lead you to setup screen.
 Firmware is installed.
 Installing multiMAN completely


 I have this CFW and version of multiman installed using Method 2 and running   on my PS3 so I know it works so ENJOY! 

Watch dogs,don bradman cricket,wolfenstein etc all latest games running fine...

ENJOY and SEED......
